title: OdinadAlE Edu
sahitya:
OdinadAlE Edu payan shol nAthanE unnaruL oru shiridilAdAr


anupallavi

  vEdam nAnguDan angam Araiyum arubattu nAngu kalaigaLum teLiya


caraNam    kaNamAgilum un kannal nAmattai karuttinil niruttik-karaindurugAmal
 kanniyarilum jaTapponnilum maNNilum karuttizhandE kAlam kazhittiruppavar ettanai
